folder.name: Account Holder withdraws cash
folder.description: As an Account Holder I want to withdraw cash from an ATM So that I can get money when the bank is closed

folder.name: Account Holder transfers cash
folder.description: As an Account Holder I want to transfer cash from an ATM So that I can transfer money between accounts

call.actionword: the ATM should not dispense any money
the ATM should say there are insufficient funds
the ATM should retain the card
the ATM should say the card has been retained

scenario.name: Account has sufficient funds for transferring cash

call.actionword: the Account Holder transfers "amount" to the savings account
the savings account balance should be "amount"
